/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a captivating view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a distinctive red roof, standing out against the greenery. The image is captured in a panoramic format, providing a wide view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue sky and the red roof of the building. This image truly captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing.
